data.text: @VanityFair I watched on and off....what a beautiful  tribute.  I am happy that I lived the Aretha experience.   I hope there's a heaven💖💖💖

@VanityFair Bill Clinton was so disrespectful sitting in the front row acting like he next to the kitchen. Trying to listen to Jennifer Hudson and him laughing and talking right behind. Then some of the bored looks when others up at podium. SO SAD.
